replies.author: huake741
replies.txt_content: 同问！凑字数啊凑字数，我可不是来水的

replies.author: slqs
replies.txt_content: mv modify set diff 难度 世界名称

replies.author: 琥珀剑心
replies.txt_content: 配置文件里有个difficult  改为0即可

slqs 发表于 2014-7-30 15:21
mv modify set diff 难度 世界名称
{:10_492:}我赞同这个，听他的吧~
